attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence in the Government
attributes.additional_details:
The present Government do not represent a majority of the UK citizens, this is evident by the way it is going against the will of the people.
We the People are calling for a show of no confidence in the government along with many local councils who are carrying out the unjust rulings of this unelected government, a government that does not have the approval nor do they have the agreement of the People and therefore they have no contract with the People
